#### PR description:
Recently a new version of the external library G4HepEm was added. To fully explore its potential electromagnetic part of configuration of EM physics should be changed. Proposed update will work only if FTFP_BERT_EMH Geant4 Physics List is used, so no change in results is expected. 

Enabling of G4HepEM should provide a significant CPU benefit for FullSim both for Run-3 and Phase-2. This will be be proposed later after seria of validations.
